sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This screen displays the Wiretapped Event that you wish to inspect.

listitem.para: Search Results - A link that takes you back to the WiretapSearchEvent page.

Prev - If the system detects that this same event was wiretapped earlier in the flow, then this action becomes available. If this link is selected then it will show the Wiretapped Event Details as it was at the previous Wiretap point in the Flow.

Next - If the system detects that this same event was wiretapped later in the flow, then this action becomes available. If this link is selected then it will show the Wiretapped Event Details as it was at the next Wiretap point in the Flow.
Search Results - A link that takes you back to the WiretapSearchEvent page.

Payload Content (XML) in new window/tab - If the Payload Content of the message is detected as XML then this action is made available. If this link is selected then a new window/tab in your browser is opened and the Payload Content is displayed in a 'Pretty XML' format.
